text: hey everyone its mark Wiens right now
I'm in Bangkok but I just wanted to give
you a quick update about what's going on
but before I do that I'm a little late
but I want to say a huge thank you for
your support for helping me to reach
100,000 subscribers I am extremely
grateful it has been an amazing
experience and an amazing learning
opportunity and I could not have done it
without your help
without you watching my videos and
without you sharing my videos so I just
want to say a massive thank you thank
you very much for for everything I also
want to thank my wife Ying who takes the
videos and who has accompanied me to
countless restaurants and gone on crazy
food excursion expeditions and she has
always supported me and come with me and
I could for sure I could not do it
without her her and I am just extremely
grateful for my amazing life so a huge
shout out to Ying she's the best
we are still filming the Thai food TV
show but it's been kind of crazy
schedule we've been travelling all over
Thailand so I haven't had much free time
I haven't been able to do too many like
vlog updates but I have been maintaining
the blog over at migration ology comm so
if you're interested in seeing updates
about what we did on the TV show go go
head over to migration ology comm and
I'll continue to blog about it and
finally we are taking a trip to Vietnam
soon about four years ago we went to
Hanoi but so this trip will be going to
Saigon Ho Chi Minh City and I have never
been there before so I'm really looking
forward to it and I want to ask you if
you have any food suggestions of things
we should eat and any local street food
restaurants we should check out where
when we're in Saigon I would love to
hear your suggestions and I actually
cannot wait to devour some delicious
Vietnamese food but again
huge thank you for helping me to reach
100,000 subscribers I'm its III when I
started making YouTube videos I had no
idea what was even possible and so I I'm
just extremely grateful and just it's
it's been an amazing journey so thank
you again for watching my videos and for
sharing my videos and if you have any
suggestions about where to eat in Saigon
Ho Chi Minh City I would love to hear
from you in the comments below and hope
you are doing well hope you're having a
great day today and I'll talk to you
soon
more many more well there's a there's a
bug many more vlogs and food videos
coming and I probably need to cut my
hair too
do you think my hair is too long ok I'll
talk to you soon
